Singular moments are also those that we appreciated the pleasure of being all alone

Moments when we leave the world outside to savor the inner world. Moments that we give to yourself. Moments of pause, of reflection, of dreams, or simply allow our senses travel and waking up it a fine tune or to a complex and challenge taste of a good wine that que choose to join us. We become free and leave, without direction, all for our pleasure. It won’t be long to the phone rings again, the agenda remember us the marked appointment, and the world rescued us again to your mad race – but this minutes are our, that’s why they are so precious.
